63 Viewer::Viewer()
64 {
65  _point_size = 2;
66  setColors();
67  // configViewer();
68 }
69 
70 void Viewer::setColors()
71 {
72  RED = { 255, 0, 0 };
73  GREEN = { 0, 255, 0 };
74  BLUE = { 0, 0, 255 };
75  PINK = { 255, 0, 128 };
76  ORANGE = { 255, 128, 0 };
77  WHITE = { 255, 255, 255 };
78 }
79 
80 void Viewer::configViewer()
81 {
82  _viewer->setBackgroundColor(0, 0, 0);
83  // _viewer->setPointCloudRenderingProperties(pcl::visualization::PCL_VISUALIZER_POINT_SIZE, _point_size);
84  _viewer->addCoordinateSystem(1.0);
85  _viewer->initCameraParameters();
86 }
87 
88 void Viewer::setPointSize(int point_size)
89 {
90  _point_size = point_size;
91  _viewer->setPointCloudRenderingProperties(pcl::visualization::PCL_VISUALIZER_POINT_SIZE, _point_size);
92 }
93 
94 void Viewer::resetViewer()
95 {
96  _viewer->removeAllCoordinateSystems();
97  _viewer->removeAllPointClouds();
98  _viewer->removeAllShapes();
99 }
100 
101 void Viewer::loopViewer()
102 {
103  while (!_viewer->wasStopped())
104  {
105  _viewer->spinOnce(100);
106  boost::this_thread::sleep(boost::posix_time::microseconds(100000));
107  }
108 }
109 
110 template <typename PointT>
111 inline void Viewer::addPCToViewer(typename pcl::PointCloud<PointT>::Ptr cloud, const pc_color& color,
112  const std::string& name)
113 {
114  configViewer();
115  pcl::visualization::PointCloudColorHandlerCustom<PointT> cloud_rgb(cloud, color.r, color.g, color.b);
116  _viewer->resetStoppedFlag();
117 
118  if (_viewer->contains(name))
119  {
120  ROS_INFO("Update cloud in Viewer");
121  _viewer->updatePointCloud(cloud, cloud_rgb, name);
122  _viewer->setPointCloudRenderingProperties(pcl::visualization::PCL_VISUALIZER_POINT_SIZE, _point_size, name);
123  }
124  else
125  {
126  ROS_INFO("Add cloud in Viewer");
127  _viewer->addPointCloud<PointT>(cloud, cloud_rgb, name);
128  _viewer->setPointCloudRenderingProperties(pcl::visualization::PCL_VISUALIZER_POINT_SIZE, _point_size, name);
129  }
130  ROS_WARN("Press (X) on viewer to continue");
131 
132  loopViewer();
133 }
134 
135 template <typename PointT>
136 inline void Viewer::addPCToViewer(typename pcl::PointCloud<PointT>::Ptr cloud, const std::string& name)
137 {
138  configViewer();
139  _viewer->resetStoppedFlag();
140 
141  if (_viewer->contains(name))
142  {
143  ROS_INFO("Update cloud in Viewer");
144  _viewer->updatePointCloud(cloud, name);
145  _viewer->setPointCloudRenderingProperties(pcl::visualization::PCL_VISUALIZER_POINT_SIZE, _point_size, name);
146  }
147  else
148  {
149  ROS_INFO("Add cloud in Viewer");
150  _viewer->addPointCloud<PointT>(cloud, name);
151  _viewer->setPointCloudRenderingProperties(pcl::visualization::PCL_VISUALIZER_POINT_SIZE, _point_size, name);
152  }
153  ROS_WARN("Press (X) on viewer to continue");
154 
155  loopViewer();
156 }
157 
158 template <typename PointT, typename CloudT>
159 inline void Viewer::addNormalsToViewer(typename pcl::PointCloud<PointT>::Ptr cloud,
160  typename pcl::PointCloud<CloudT>::Ptr normals, const std::string& name)
161 {
162  _viewer->resetStoppedFlag();
163 
164  ROS_INFO("Add normals to cloud in Viewer");
165  _viewer->addPointCloudNormals<PointT, CloudT>(cloud, normals, 1, 0.02, name);
166  ROS_WARN("Press (X) on viewer to continue");
167 
168  loopViewer();
169 }
170 
171 template <typename PointT>
172 inline void Viewer::addCorrespondencesToViewer(typename pcl::PointCloud<PointT>::Ptr source_cloud,
173  typename pcl::PointCloud<PointT>::Ptr target_cloud,
174  pcl::CorrespondencesPtr correspondences)
175 {
176  _viewer->resetStoppedFlag();
177 
178  ROS_INFO("Add correspondences between clouds in Viewer");
179  _viewer->addCorrespondences<PointT>(source_cloud, target_cloud, *correspondences);
180  ROS_WARN("Press (X) on viewer to continue");
181 
182  loopViewer();
183 
184  _viewer->removeCorrespondences();
185 }
186 
187 template <typename PointT>
188 void Viewer::visualizePointCloud(typename pcl::PointCloud<PointT>::Ptr cloud)
189 {
190  boost::shared_ptr<pcl::visualization::PCLVisualizer> pc_viewer(
191  new pcl::visualization::PCLVisualizer("Pointcloud viewer"));
192  ROS_INFO("Display cloud in Viewer");
193 
194  pc_viewer->setBackgroundColor(0, 0, 0);
195  pc_viewer->addPointCloud<PointT>(cloud, "cloud");
196  pc_viewer->setPointCloudRenderingProperties(pcl::visualization::PCL_VISUALIZER_POINT_SIZE, 3);
197  pc_viewer->addCoordinateSystem(1.0);
198  pc_viewer->initCameraParameters();
199  ROS_WARN("Press (X) on viewer to continue");
200 
201  while (!pc_viewer->wasStopped())
202  {
203  pc_viewer->spinOnce(100);
204  boost::this_thread::sleep(boost::posix_time::microseconds(100000));
205  }
206 }
207 
208 void Viewer::deletePCFromViewer(const std::string& name)
209 {
210  _viewer->resetStoppedFlag();
211 
212  ROS_INFO("Remove cloud from Viewer");
213  _viewer->removePointCloud(name);
214  ROS_WARN("Press (X) on viewer to continue");
215 
216  loopViewer();
217 }
218 
219 void Viewer::keyboardCallback(const pcl::visualization::KeyboardEvent& event, void* nothing)
220 {
221  if (event.getKeySym() == "space" && event.keyDown())
222  _pressed_space = true;
223 }
224 
225 void Viewer::checkForSpaceKeyPressed()
226 {
227  _viewer->registerKeyboardCallback(&Viewer::keyboardCallback, *this);
228 }
229 
230 void Viewer::visualizeMesh(pcl::PolygonMesh::Ptr mesh)
231 {
232  boost::shared_ptr<pcl::visualization::PCLVisualizer> mesh_viewer(
233  new pcl::visualization::PCLVisualizer("Mesh mesh_viewer"));
234  ROS_INFO("Display mesh in Viewer");
235 
236  mesh_viewer->setBackgroundColor(0, 0, 0);
237  mesh_viewer->addPolygonMesh(*mesh, "meshes", 0);
238  mesh_viewer->addCoordinateSystem(1.0);
239  mesh_viewer->initCameraParameters();
240  ROS_WARN("Press (X) on viewer to continue");
241 
242  while (!mesh_viewer->wasStopped())
243  {
244  mesh_viewer->spinOnce(100);
245  boost::this_thread::sleep(boost::posix_time::microseconds(100000));
246  }
247 }
